## Problem Type
- [ ] **Unclear**: Instructions are confusing
- [ ] **Incorrect**: Information is wrong or outdated
- [ ] **Missing**: Information should be included but isn't
- [ ] **Broken link**: Reference points to non-existent file
- [ ] **Typo**: Spelling or grammar error
- [ ] **Formatting**: Hard to read or follow
